title: Choose Target Market
description: You're clear on the problems you aim to solve. Before you begin brainstorming offer ideas, let's first refine your target market. You'll choose a market that shares common traits, common triggers, and/or common transformation.

placeholders.marketNamePlaceholder: e.g., Plateaued Agency Owners Seeking Scalability
placeholders.commonTraitsPlaceholder: e.g., Senior consultants, fractional CMOs, solo strategists, brand architects, or marketing agency owners
placeholders.commonTriggersPlaceholder: e.g., They've hit a revenue plateau in their business

tooltips.marketNameTooltip: Create a descriptive name that captures the essence of your target market
tooltips.commonTraitsTooltip: List the most defining shared characteristics (demographic, firmographic, psychographic)
tooltips.commonTriggersTooltip: List the specific triggers most relevant to this group experiencing the target moment/pain

examples: Established Coaches Transitioning to Group Programs
